attributes.name: Heretic's Robes
attributes.description: "Listen to me! Listen to me! She is here!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Listen to me! Listen to me! She is here!"

attributes.name: Hide Headgear
attributes.description: Let none deny your beautiful hair... or lack thereof.
attributes.parsed_description: Let none deny your beautiful hair... or lack thereof.

attributes.name: Hierophant's Ascension
attributes.description: "The sky would open and welcome them, breathing an ancient power into their soul. You would join them."
attributes.parsed_description: "The sky would open and welcome them, breathing an ancient power into their soul. You would join them."

attributes.name: Highwayman’s Balaclava
attributes.description: “A cocked hat with a mask to cover crooked grin”
attributes.parsed_description: “A cocked hat with a mask to cover crooked grin”

attributes.name: Highwayman’s Boots
attributes.description: “Harried in pursuit of the a prize, gold as the morning light.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Harried in pursuit of the a prize, gold as the morning light.”

attributes.name: Highwayman’s Breeches
attributes.description: “Rugged protection to chase the moonlight.”

attributes.name: Highwayman’s Duster
attributes.description: “Well-worn buckskin to keep the many dangers of Aeternum at bay”
attributes.parsed_description: “Well-worn buckskin to keep the many dangers of Aeternum at bay”

attributes.name: Highwayman’s Riding Gloves
attributes.description: “Keep one hand tightly on the reins, and the other loosely on the trigger”
attributes.parsed_description: “Keep one hand tightly on the reins, and the other loosely on the trigger”

attributes.name: Hood of Dark Secrets
attributes.description: "What lies sit behind that hood?"
